Countries Of The World - Music Pack For Games


Preview all tracks


❮❮❮❮❮ HERE’S EVERYTHING YOU’RE GETTING WITH THIS PACK ❯❯❯❯❯


  • 10 Original high-quality music tracks
  • 27 WAV Files including Full Tracks & Short Versions

  • Commercial Rights & Royalty-Free License

  1. Lost In Budapest
  2. Eastern Spirit

❮❮❮❮❮ YOUTUBE POLICY ❯❯❯❯❯


Our music is registered in YouTube's Content ID system to prevent unauthorized usage & piracy. Although Unreal Engine Marketplace EULA does not include YouTube monetization, we are offering free whitelisting for our customers. If you have purchased this pack and want to monetize your own promotional videos on YouTube, please contact us at: whitelisting@composersquad.com and we will whitelist your video/channel in the Content ID system. Please note that this doesn’t extend to third parties monetizing videos on YouTube.
